ingredients: 3 lbs chicken, I usually use dark meat, but a mix of both or even just white meat works as well
1 orange or yellow bell pepper, diced small
28 oz green chile enchilada sauce, a store-bought sauce is fine
Optional: 1 1/2 cups cooked beans or 1 can, drained (I've used pinto, black and great northern)
1 teaspoon granulated garlic, or garlic powder
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
Optional: fresh cilantro, chopped for garnish and sour cream for topping
